titleStmt.title: A new game at cards, or, The three nimble shuffling cheaters to a pleasant new tune, Or, what you please.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Francis Coles, John Wright, Tho. Vere and William Gilbertson,

notesStmt.note: Publication data suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
